Radio host Frank Ritchie’s daughter Selah on mend after Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome surgery https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/radio-host-frank-ritchies-daughter-selah-on-mend-after-ehlers-danlos-syndrome-surgery/2IOVQBHIDFBYXGN6BCBF3FAKPQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/radio-host-frank-ritchies-daughter-selah-on-mend-after-ehlers-danlos-syndrome-surgery/2IOVQBHIDFBYXGN6BCBF3FAKPQ/ The radio Rev says the magnitude of what they had been through was still dawning on him. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 20:33:49 +0000 Selah Ritchie with her father, Newstalk ZB host Frank Ritchie and mother Melva Ritchie. The family has just returned from Germany where Selah had surgery to treat her debilitating Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome.
